remarks: A non-triviality lemma for finite sequences.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Dec-2017.)
statement:
fprodntriv.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
fprodntriv.2 $e |- ( ph -> N e. Z ) $.
fprodntriv.3 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ ( M ... N ) ) $.
fprodntriv $p |- ( ph -> E. n e. Z E. y ( y =/= 0 /\ seq n ( x. , ( k e. Z |-> if ( k e. A , B , 1 ) ) ) ~~> y ) ) $.
$d A k n $.
$d A k n y $.
$d B n $.
$d B n y $.
$d N n $.
$d N n y $.
$d Z k n $.
$d Z k n y $.
$d n ph $.
